segments.text: Yeah . Just pull on this strip . Then peel off the back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You might make a few enemies this way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If they don't think this is fun , they're not meant to be our friends .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean your friends . I think it's cruel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . But it's fun . Look at those two ugly old ladies ... or are they men ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hurry ! Get a shot ! ... Hand it over !
segments.speaker: S2
